title: ‘If only I’d found out earlier I had pelvic congestion syndrome’
description: Sophie Robehmed suffered from back and stomach pains for years before being diagnosed with PCS.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Declan Brooks 'won't ever get over' double-backflip BMX crash
description: Declan Brooks was knocked unconscious in a crash that almost cost him his BMX place at Tokyo.

title: Week in pictures: 24-30 July 2021
description: A selection of powerful images taken around the world this week.

title: Nigeria's kidnap crisis: 'I saw my two-year-old carried by a man with a gun'
description: Parents of schoolchildren abducted in Nigeria describe their trauma, and dilemma over the ransom demands.

title: Mitholz - the tranquil Swiss village facing a time bomb
description: More than 60 years after a deadly explosion ruined Mitholz, the village remains under threat.

title: The man who 'killed' Pluto
description: How Mike Brown’s discovery of a larger object threatened Pluto’s 75-year status as a planet

title: Dorset photographer shoots Star Wars Lego in cinematic style
description: A 34-year-old Dorset photographer is recreating cinematic sci-fi scenes using his Star Wars Lego kits.

title: 'Bennerley Viaduct has Facebook followers in Germany'
description: The Victorian rail bridge was almost demolished but now has fans all over the world.

title: KT Tunstall on her show-halting hearing loss
description: The singer-songwriter has put her touring plans on hold over concerns she could become completely deaf.

title: 'Covid vaccine scammers nearly got me'
description: Sioban Moore escaped disaster by a whisker after receiving a fake email inviting her for a jab.

title: Employee shortages: Where have all the workers gone?
description: From hospitality to road haulage, firms say they can't get staff. So are employees now calling the shots?

title: Leg breaks to crowdfunding - Shriever's gold medal story
description: Bethany Shriever lost funding in 2017. Four years and one crowdfunding campaign later, she's BMX Olympic champion.

title: Hunt for certainty over Covid cases continues
description: Flurry of Covid data does not resolve debate around state of the pandemic in the UK.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Alexander Zverev beats Novak Djokovic to reach final
description: Novak Djokovic's hopes of winning a 'Golden Slam' are over after losing to Alexander Zverev in the Olympic tennis semi-finals.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Two medals, no gold - what has gone wrong with GB rowing?
description: Team GB finishes 14th in the rowing medal table after winning only two medals at Tokyo 2020. So where did it all go wrong?

title: Women's Olympic football: GB suffer dramatic extra time defeat to Australia
description: Great Britain suffer a heartbreaking extra-time defeat by Australia in the Olympic women's football quarter-finals.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Who are the contenders for Usain Bolt's 100m crown?
description: For the first time since 2004 an athlete other than Usain Bolt will win the men's Olympic 100m - but who are the contenders for gold?

title: Tokyo Olympics: Team GB beat the USA to reach the semi-finals of the women's rugby sevens -highlights
description: Watch highlights as Great Britain beat the USA 21-12 to reach the semi-finals of the women's rugby sevens and keep their Olympic medal hopes alive in Tokyo.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Relive how GB's Bethany Shriever and Kye Whyte won historic BMX medals
description: Watch the best bits from GB's history-making day in the BMX racing finals, as Britain's Bethany Shriever wins gold in the women's final and Kye Whyte takes silver in the men's final.

title: 'Brighton cat killer' Steven Bouquet jailed for stabbing 16 pets
description: Steven Bouquet has been jailed for more than five years after he killed nine cats in night attacks.

title: Ardoyne baby death: Woman in court charged with murder
description: A 29-year-old woman appears in court charged with the murder of a baby boy in Ardoyne.

title: The X Factor: 'It's always something I'm proud of'
description: Former X Factor contestants on what it was like to star in one of the biggest show on TV.

title: Max Verstappen fastest in Hungarian Grand Prix first practice
description: Red Bull's Max Verstappen heads Mercedes drivers Valtteri Bottas and Lewis Hamilton in first practice at the Hungarian Grand Prix.

title: Storm Evert: Strong winds and heavy rain cause disruption
description: There were more than 20 rescues off the Isles of Scilly where winds reached 69mph (111km/h).

title: Tokyo Olympics: Alexander Zverev beats Novak Djokovic to reach tennis final
description: Germany's Alexander Zverev defeats top seed and world number one Novak Djokovic at the Tokyo Olympics, ending the Serb's hopes of a "Golden Slam".

title: Esther Dingley: Remains confirmed as those of missing hiker
description: Esther Dingley disappeared in the Pyrenees mountains in November.

title: Covid-19 pandemic: Japan widens emergency over 'frightening' spike
description: The Olympics host is facing record Covid case numbers, fuelled by the virulent Delta strain.

title: Turkey fires: Blazes threaten Marmaris and other coastal resorts
description: Villages and hotels are evacuated as firefighters attempt to put out dozens of blazes.

title: Hong Kong: First person jailed under security law given nine years
description: Tong Ying-kit rode a motorbike into police officers while flying a flag with a protest slogan.

title: Pregnant women urged to get jab as majority unvaccinated
description: Estimates suggest hundreds of thousands of pregnant women in England have not yet had the vaccine.

title: Drug deaths in Scotland reach new record level
description: The country continues to have the worst drug death rate in Europe, with a further 1,339 people dying last year.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Bryony Page wins trampolining bronze for second Olympic medal
description: Great Britain's Bryony Page claims her second Olympic medal as she wins bronze in the women's trampolining final.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Simone Biles apparatus finals in doubt because of continuing 'twisties'
description: US gymnast Simone Biles says she is still struggling with the 'twisties', raising doubts about whether she will compete in the apparatus finals.

title: Shriever takes BMX gold as GB claim six medals
description: Bethany Shriever claims BMX gold and Kye White silver as Duncan Scott and Luke Greenbank add to Great Britain's swimming medal haul.

title: Shriever wins BMX gold for GB, Whyte takes silver in men's event
description: Britain's Bethany Shriever wins gold in the women's BMX racing final, moments after Kye Whyte claims the nation's first Olympic medal in the men's.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Ben Whittaker and Pat McCormack wins secure boxing medals
description: Great Britain's Ben Whittaker and Pat McCormack are both guaranteed Olympic medals after winning their respective fights on Friday.

title: Ballymena: Rare cancer diagnosis leads to unlikely friendship
description: Cat McKenna and Amber Scott met after being diagnosed with neuroendocrine cancer.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Dina Asher-Smith into 100m semis as Ta Lou, Fraser-Pryce & Thompson-Herah set pace
description: Dina Asher-Smith starts her bid to become the first British woman to win an Olympic individual sprint gold with progress in the 100m heats.

title: The Papers: 'No jab, no job' threat and 'red alert' for travel
description: The papers cover concerns about compulsory vaccination at work and possible changes to travel rules.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Bethany Shriever wins gold for GB in women's BMX final
description: Britain's Bethany Shriever wins gold in the women's BMX racing final, holding off two-time champion Mariana Pajon.

title: Russian module mishap destabilises International Space Station
description: The ISS was pushed out of position after engines on a new Russian module unexpectedly fired up.

title: Olympics: The hidden sight of Tokyo's homeless
description: For many among Tokyo's homeless community the Olympics are far from a cause for celebration.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Duncan Scott wins silver medal in 200m individual medley final
description: Duncan Scott wins his third medal of the Tokyo Olympics and GB's sixth in the pool with silver in the men's 200m individual medley.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Duncan Scott wins third medal with silver in 200m medley
description: Duncan Scott wins his third medal of the Tokyo Olympics and Great Britain's sixth in the pool with silver in the men's 200m individual medley.

title: Walking and biking prioritised in new Highway Code
description: Greater priority for pedestrians at crossings and for cyclists at junctions are among the changes.

title: No GB rowing gold for first time since 1980 but men's eight take bronze
description: Great Britain fail to win an Olympic rowing gold for the first Games since 1980 as the men's eight crew claim bronze.

title: Are America's unvaccinated changing their minds?
description: Covid cases are surging across the US, fuelled by the Delta variant - and unvaccinated Americans.

title: ‘I'm black, my partner's white - stop asking me if this is my baby’
description: When Ena Miller had a baby, she was unprepared for the constant comments about her daughter's skin tone.
